company_info.Company Description: Dear Candidates,We are engaged in the business of worldwide tourism and having our offices at Kolkata and Mumbai.  The Job Profile is to promote our various services online as well as offline, ad posting and Advertising etc.

jd_information.description: Dear Candidates,Urgent requirement of Executives for online promotion job of worldwide tourism company located at Mumbai.  Male/Femael Candidates having 12th Pass and above with Basic computer knowledge and good communication skill in English & Hindi need apply.  Age 18+ and above.  No Stress, No Target, No Field work.  Apply confidently.
